title: I Lost My Job For Sleeping in the Restroom
content:
T﻿his is the day I acquired a [TC Helicon Duplicator](https://www.tc-helicon.com/product.html?modelCode=P0DDX). My voice needs all the help it can get! Recorded straight into Adobe Audition through an old, shit Behringer mixer that is no longer with us. A﻿lthough I spent a lot of time hiding in the crapper during my stint at Goodyear, I didn't get fired. I just left.
A Walking Pile of Adidas Crap · I Lost My Job For Sleeping In The Restroom
